content: Import — Transmission Loss) Source of net electricity is Joint Meter Reading (JMR) Point’. (Net Electricity = Net Export — Import ) Source of net electricity is Joint meter reading (JMR) and recalculating the final values from the PSS meter/controller reading and GSS reading. So, the revised description in MR is found to be correct. It is a minor correction in calculation method and_ this change in description does not impact the applicability of the methodology, additionality or the appropriateness of the baseline scenario. Since the JMR provides only GSS meter reading, the net Share certificate. electricity cannot be sourced from JMR only.
